Title: Defragmenting Memory
Description:
My oath is to be a compiler. I collect and tell the stories of our people.

<Brennok sighs.>

Is there wisdom in stories told by someone who never lived them? I've never had an adventure. I was afraid to overwrite the stories entrusted to me.

So I started transcribing them into a book I hid here. Each time we returned to Shadowvein Point, I added more.

I was going to leave and pass on the book, but scorpids ransacked it. Please, find the missing pages before they stuff them into their nests.
ObjectivesText: Collect 100 Missing Pages of Brennok's book.
CompletionText: Thousands of stories, now they're probably lining some animal's den...
RewardText:
By the Titans, thank you! I don't know what I would have done if I'd lost these. 

I can finally leave without failing my oath.
